author: Philip McGregor
comment: Seems very useful, but it drained my wear watch battery to zero after 6 hours.

reply.author: Neologue Computing
reply.content: Yes, battery life is definitely a major issue for watches especially with apps like this. If you use the app in specific conditions though (such as while driving or walking) you can turn the sensor off outside those periods and fend off disaster.

title: Battery problems

author: Brandon Appeldoorn
comment: Downloading this just so I can be like "look at DA flicka da wrist"
title: Flicka DA wrist

author: trent tolkien
comment: Took a little bit of practice but it works great.
title: Game Changer.

author: Spooky Verkauferin
comment: This app needs some work but its outstanding! I can finally have it so i can quickly open an app at the flick of a wrist and not worry about it turning on all the time due to stupid hand movements! Great job and keep it up!
title: Wow!

author: Kyle Ruggles
comment: But I'll get the hang of it.  Kodos to the Dev!   One lil annoying thing though, when I switch to another app and then back to FlickStart, the intro popup continues to pop up. I'd expect it only to pop up with every initial launch when I ask to see it next time.    FlickStart is off to a great start!
